name: The Fall (itch) (Badosz)
description:
You are running out of power. Can you survive?

Collect Gold, Power Boxes. Upgrade your speed, gold multiplier, buy shield. Survive.

Controls:

wsad - to move

mouse - everything else

Game made in 72h on Ludum Dare Jam 39.

Also, don't forget to leave feedback in the forums below or in the Discord.

DISCORD/TWITTER/WEBSITE/LUDUM DARE PAGE
